# cameraShutter

**Type Property**

The default sound for photo capture.

## Declaration

```swift
class var cameraShutter: AVCaptureEventSound { get }
```

## Accessing default sounds

- **beginVideoRecording**: The default sound for starting a video recording.
- **endVideoRecording**: The default sound for ending a video recording.

items.description: The default sound for starting a video recording.
items.name: beginVideoRecording

items.description: The default sound for ending a video recording.
